report.title: Filterable species by month and taxon group
report.description: Counts species by month broken down by species group, with standard params support.
report.query: select #columns# from generate_series(1,12) as months(no) left join (cache_occurrences_functional o #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND o.date_start is not null #idlist# ) on date_part('month', o.date_start)=months.no

column.name: group_1
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.taxon_group_id=#group_1# then COALESCE(o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key, o.taxon_meaning_id::varchar) else null end)
